section.title: <xar:break />
section.t: Escapes the closest <xar:for />, <xar:foreach />, <xar:loop />, or <xar:while />. The depth attribute, if present and an integer greater than 1, an equal number of enclosing loops are broken out of.

list.t: [depth] (1) how many levels of enclosing loops to be broken out of.

t.artwork: <xar:for start="$i = 0" test="$i lt 10" iter="$i++"> <xar:if condition="$i eq 5"> <xar:break/> </xar:if> #$i# </xar:for>
